/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades bathed in sunlight. A few cars can be seen in the distance, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the buildings, and gives a sense of depth and scale to the landscape. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the sunny weather and the lively atmosphere of the city.
